message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you can have 10%.  We can work out a better deal later.
Let's meet in the middle and split it 50/50. It's a fair start.

I understand you want a more even split, but I'm still willing to take a larger share. Let's meet in the middle at 80/20. This gives you a significant increase from your last offer, and we can continue to negotiate as the rounds progress.
I'm willing to give you a slightly larger share, but I think 70/30 is a more reasonable compromise. It's still a significant improvement from my initial offer.

I appreciate your flexibility, but I think 85/15 is a more fair compromise.  This gives you a larger share than your previous offer, while still allowing me to secure a significant portion of the money. Let's see if we can reach an agreement this round.
I'm willing to compromise further, but I think 60/40 is the minimum I can accept. It's getting close to the 50/50 split I initially proposed, and I'm willing to meet you halfway.
We're running out of time. Let's make a deal.  I'm willing to go back to my previous offer of 80/20.  It's the best we can do given the current circumstances.
